ygData.subject: Yargon sighs clearly dissapointed
ygData.msgSnippet: Ever been in a group thinking man this really s#$%^? One of those groups where nobody knows what they re doing? Sigh had it happen last night we started
ygData.messageBody:
Ever been in a group thinking man this really
s#$%^? One of those groups where nobody knows what
they're doing? <br>Sigh had it happen last night we
started out great. Xaiver Human Shadow Knight and by now
a friend and daily hunting partner Zorbdak the best
litle kick ass halfling druid I ever had the pleausure
to group with and Ltle old me. We met up with a
ranger and i thouhg great we have a good puller here...
But that turned out wrong. we where then in a chaos
group. Everybody just pulled something and I still
haven't forgiven Xaiver for pulling a Deepwater croc in
Oasis. Ha well he died I barly made it.<br><br>We went
back to North Ro to check derv camps as usual ofcourse
they where all camped. Butt at camp 2 where 2 people
in that group I'd grouped with before. So I went
over and ask nicley if they would very much would mind
sharing the spawn... (yes we Dark Elfs can play nice too)
That wasn't a problem and for a moment the old magic
was back. We got a Wiz and Pally in aswell at this
time and Dervs had litle on us... Until Zorbdak had to
log...the ranger lost connection and the wiz ran of all the
time to go and sell/buy stuff at the plat, getting
himself killed in getting there twice. In the meantime
the Pally just refused to do anything but
tank...<br><br>So there we are 2 shadow knights and a paladin...
Sure we can take out a derv at a time but it just
costs us to much and sometimes you pull several at
once.. and hey what about those casters?<br><br>We
couldn't get a healer Xaiver and I stormed the camp out of
pure frustration when the other group was selling. We
had four dervs on us. We got them ll with the two of
us (Pally was afk). And it did feel rather nice ;-)
but I had 2 bubbles health left and Xaiver had 3 and
sitting on your bumm all the time to heal up is not my
idea of fun.<br>I ended up getting frustated and
Xaiver was too. So I made up an excuse and left. I
didn't even want to play anymore so I logged. All in all
one of my worst days in Norath :(
